mapper.sql: id, name, description, img, beginTime, endTime, type, status, is_delete
mapper.select: select activity.id, activity.`name`, activity.description, activity.img, activity.createTime, activity.beginTime, activity.endTime, activity.type, activity.status from activity where activity.is_delete = 0
mapper.update: update activity set activity.`name` = #{name}, activity.beginTime = #{beginTime} , activity.endTime = #{endTime}, activity.status = #{status}, activity.description = #{description} where activity.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select activity.id, activity.`name`, activity.description, activity.img, activity.createTime, activity.beginTime, activity.endTime, activity.type, activity.status from activity where activity.is_delete = 0 AND activity.id > 10
mapper.insert: insert into activity(id, `name`, description, createTime, beginTime, endTime, type, status, is_delete) values (#{shopActivityId},#{shopActivityName},#{description},#{createTime},#{beginTime},#{endTime},#{type},1,0)
